com.voodoovox.calleranalytics.api
Class CaApiBase

java.lang.Object
  com.voodoovox.calleranalytics.api.CaApiBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
Caller, Event, Lookup
public class CaApiBase
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for Caller Analytics API commands.

Uses Java system property "calleranalytics.apikey" as the API Key for Caller Analytics, which must be set before using any Caller Analytics commands. Call

CaApiBase.init( apiKey );

Or

System.setProperty( "calleranalytics.apikey", apiKey );

Or include the line

calleranalytics.apikey=YOUR_API_KEY

in a Java properties file called "calleranalytics.properties" included in your classpath.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Joseph Monti

public static void init(java.lang.String apiKey)

Parameters:

send

public static org.json.JSONObject send(java.lang.String command,
                                       CaApiBase.CaApiMethod method,
                                       org.json.JSONObject jsonIn)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       org.json.JSONException,
                                       CaApiException
Send API command to CallerAnalytics.

Parameters:
command - The API command/class name
method - The method on the command
jsonIn - The JSON object to pass to the API command
Returns:
The "response" JSON Object when "result" is "ack" (i.e. successful API call)
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Usually network error communicating with Caller Analytics
org.json.JSONException - Error parsing JSON response
CaApiException - On "nack" result.
